title: OneDrive: Offline mode
description:
,This feature will
allow you to launch OneDrive in your browser and view, sort, rename, move,
copy, delete and files even without internet access. Additionally, for locally
stored OneDrive files (those that are marked as “always available offline”) you
will be able to open and work on these in your browser even if you are offline.
All of the changes you make offline will be automatically synced back when
Internet connection is restored.
